Name: Drifting with Maxwell Cat: The Game
About the game: Drifting with Maxwell Cat The Game - is a thrilling skateboarding game that puts you in control of your favorite meme characters as they drift their way through wacky, obstacle-filled levels. Customize and tune your skateboard to fit your playstyle, and rack up points as you slide past challenges and pull off epic stunts. With a vibrant art style and intuitive controls, It is the ultimate blend of arcade action and customization. Whether you're a seasoned skate pro or new to the scene, there's something for everyone in this meme-filled adventure. Here's what you can expect: Customize and fine-tune your skateboard to suit your playstyle Rack up points as you slide past challenges and execute epic stunts Enjoy a vibrant art style and intuitive controls Play as a seasoned skateboarding pro or just starting out Experience an entertaining, meme-filled adventure So grab your board and get ready to shred!
